column1: We live at a high, dry altitude, and these conditions can be brutal on the skin....snow, wind and sun. I use L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Hydra Nutrition Facial Oil twice a day as protection from the elements. It does a remarkable job moisturizing. Love the way it leaves my skin feeling, hydrated, supple and clean.

I normally love Loreal products but I'm afraid this one is just too greasy for me. It smells great, goes on easily, but is pretty heavy to wear out of the house. It definitely gives me quite a shine and a "wet" look. I would recommend it for night use or for around the house but not to wear if you are going out.

I love the feel of this oil/ lotion! Really helps to smooth my dry skin. Walmart was also so helpful and generous in fixing an error that ended up being my fault. I was very pleased with my whole experience.

L'Oréal is a good skincare line to begin with, so I was pretty certain this would be a good product, and it is. Not too greasy, but does hydrate the skin, and I'm a 61 yr old senior, so I definitely know if my skin is looking and feeling better. Also, a little drop goes a long way, and that's really all you need. I use it morning and then again at night. Love this product!

I have a very sensitive skin that is prone to adult acne and I was really apprehensive about using this product as it is an oil but to my surprise it is not at all oily in fact its lighter than a regular moisturizer and trust me you can use it in winters as well as summers... It's that dry and a SPF of 30 is a plus plus plus.

Having truly combination skin, my t-zone is very oily and my cheeks super dry. Wary of putting additional oil on my face, this stuff is AWESOME. It soothes, moisturizes, is surprisingly light and absorbs quickly. It somehow balances things out. You should avoid putting it too close to eye makeup as it will not be too conducive to setting your makeup, but overall is very easy to use. I love this stuff!

I have been using it for three weeks now, and here is my experience, I have Asian skin and I don't get sun burn. But I do get tan and my skin gets dry. So I used this oil and it's the best I have tried yet, it's NOT greasy at all. It hydrates skin and I feel I have baby skin, no stickyness at all, no mark of oils on your cloths at all. I love it and I will highly recommend it to all my loved ones. Because it's worth investing, a little bit goes along way

This is a light facial oil, perfect under your day cream, night cream, or make up! The added bonus, it has an SPF 30, so you get the extra sun protection we all need. Love it, instant glow, and seems to sink in right away, it's a really good addition to my skin care regimen !

I truly can not give a true recommendation of this product because the time frame I have had this product there has been very little sun in our area to see if this kept you from getting sun burned. I can say that I used it and it did seem to help the dry skin areas on my face to be more pliable,soft to touch. For this reason I could recommend this product and will check it out more has we see more sunshine.

My sister and I tried the Perfect Hydra-Nutrition Facial Oil, SPF 30 for over a week. We didnt notice any wrinkles fading away but we did notice a real nice softness to our faces. It's easy to rub in without being oily or greasy and leave the face a little moist looking. Easy to apply make up over it. We would highly recommend this oil to any woman looking for a soft dewey look to her face. It's really nice oil!

At 68 years old and having lived in extremely dry climates for the past 50 years, my face is dry and cracked. This facial treatment is the bomb. My face is soft and supple now. Still wrinkled but softly so now. Would recommend that you start using it by at least 40years old to prevent the kind of damage I have.
